properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01, DNC 07.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V POLARCUS ALIMA
   TOWING 12 8100 METER LONG CABLES ALONG
   TRACKLINES BETWEEN:
   A. 24 JAN
      35-30.45S 051-05.23W AND 35-18.17S 051-24.22W.
   B. 24 JAN
      35-08.97S 051-24.35W AND 35-24.35S 050-59.83W.
   C. 24 JAN
      35-30.18S 051-04.98W AND 35-17.90S 051-23.97W.
   D. 25 JAN
      35-08.70S 051-24.55W AND 35-24.58S 050-59.60W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 243/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 26 JAN 17.
